Text: My connection speed isn't exactly the greatest, and has been known to reset itself from time to time. If at any point the torrent stops downloading, please don't remove it just wait a minute and I'm sure my connection will reload itself.

Also: all the information pdfs, workbooks and tutorials are within the "documents" folder (eg ".MiraiMiraidocuments") if you're truly interested in learning the program. It teaches a lot of very good introductory subdivision modeling techniques, most of which are forgotten today. I think it's a great way to start learning and develop an extremely clean modeling workflow. Most of the techniques you learn can be applied to other packages :)
